annonstext:
Maskinoperatör – Machine operator

	Full-time,
	Workplace in both Barsebäck and Oskarshamn.

For the decommissioning projects we are delivering in Barsebäck and Oskarshamn we need to incorporate an operator with experience in mechanics.

About the job

Work tasks including;

	set-up, use and maintenance of special machinery including a cutting robot to be used for the dismantling and remote cutting of parts from nuclear plants,
	execution of welding,
	installation of structures in metal carpentry and ventilation skid,
	use of workshop and hand tools to perform different types of manual cutting operations,
	handling of loads and containers with forklifts.

Education

	Technical specialization in mechanics.

Experience

The operator shall have proven experience in / knowledge of:

	set-up, start-up, use and maintenance of industrial machinery,
	machinery automation and mechatronics,
	robotics maintenance,
	robotic cutting or welding procedures,
	welding methodologies,
	cutting with oxy-torch and/or plasma,
	use of workshop tools also for manual cold cutting activities,
	air and/or ventilation skids,
	hydraulics, pneumatics, process control systems,
	handling of loads/containers.
